channel.title: How do you mute a player in moparscape?
channel.description:
hi all, if you own a server how do you mute a player if you need to for 48 hours? this is important for me, instead of banning I could mute them instead.
Many Thanks James.[br][size=1]Posted on: June 20, 2007, 10:23:32 AM[/size][hr]the "report abuse" button doesn't work.
James.

item.title: How do you mute a player in moparscape?

item.description:
@musicmad441 wrote:

well, they may not need to be banned.

item.title: How do you mute a player in moparscape?

@system wrote:

Why not just ban them then unban them after 48 hours…
